page.title: 12BODFARI TODDLER GROUP
page.content: In September 1984 a toddler group was started in the village of Bodfari.It is run by two of the mothers in the village and is open to children aged between two and a half years old and three and a half years old. The group meets two mornings a week on Wednesdays and Fridays in the recreation room opposite Bodfari School. At the present time there are sixteen toddlers and they spend their time painting and playing with toys.They are also given a snack half way through the session. Many of the toddlers will join the part time nursery at Ysgol Bodfari at the beginning of the school year they are four years old.
